rooms.name: The Forgotten Courtyard
rooms.description: A crumbling courtyard surrounded by grand archways, once a majestic entrance to the kingdom. Now, it lies in ruins, overgrown with ivy and guarded by ancient stone statues.

rooms.name: The Enchanted Ballroom
rooms.description: An opulent ballroom frozen in time, adorned with shimmering chandeliers and exquisite d√©cor. Soft music plays from an unseen source, and faint footsteps echo.

rooms.name: The Cursed Well
rooms.description: A small courtyard with a well, it has been said to grant wishes but cursed to grant at a heavy price. The water in the well reflects dark secrets.

rooms.name: The Living Gardens
rooms.description: An enchanted garden filled with mystical flora and fauna. The plants seem to respond to the Hero's presence, guiding their path or hindering their progress.

rooms.name: The Throne Room
rooms.description: The grand throne room, now deserted and draped in faded banners of the kingdom. The empty throne holds a pivotal secret.

rooms.name: The Whispering Library
rooms.description: A vast Library filled with dusty tomes and shelves stretching to high vaulted ceilings. Soft whispers seem to echo from the books themselves, revealing forgotten knowledge.

rooms.name: The Haunted Gallery
rooms.description: A gallery filled with portraits of the past royals, each with haunting eyes that seem to follow your every move. Whispers of betrayal and tragedy fill the air.

rooms.name: The Starlit Observatory
rooms.description: A domed observatory atop the Kingdoms tallest tower, revealing a breathtaking view of the night sky. Constellations and celestial bodies adorn the ceiling.

rooms.name: The Timeless Clocktower
rooms.description: A towering clock that stands in the heart of the kingdom, perpetually showing a mysterious symbol instead of the time. The clock tower holds the essence of time itself.

rooms.name: The Labyrinthine Catacombs
rooms.description: A labyrinth of dark, winding catacombs, lit only by flickering torches. It houses cryptic symbols and hidden traps, guarding the secrets of the past kings.
